test.name: SecretMMS.TC.020
test.description: Validate "Secret MMS" Use Case does not function when Sender&Recipient are in DB & Sender has "Secret MMS" feature enabled & Sender sends "Secret MMS" to a Recipient who has a registered password but not with this Sender Test Category: MUST Test Steps: --------------------------------------------------------------- 1. Sender and Recipient both are provision in application 2. Sender has "Secret MMS" feature enabled. 3. Recipient has a registered password but not with this Sender. 4. Send Secret MM1 Message to MMS Proxy 5. MMS Proxy should intercept this message and send Request to Application as HTTPS GET Request 6. Application checks whether Sender and Recipient information is available in the DB. ---------------------------------------------------------------
